welcome_text: Find the right shelter for tonight!
name: Name

home.introduction:
This Project of the TU-Berlin aims to link shelters for homeless with our digital age. On our website you can find a place for the homeless. At present, the shelters can be displayed on a map or in a list. 
 
 Furthermore, we cooperate in close relationship with the Kältebusof the Stadtmission Berlin, who pick up people which don't have the strength to make it to a shelter on their own.

map.headline: Map
map.description: Search for a shelter on the map.

shelterOverview.description: Search for a shelter in the list.

legal.headline: Legal Informations
legal.description: In cooperation with the Stadtmission Berlin the cold bus for homeless people can be called. Here you can find further information.
